item.title: yuzhong
item.description: × YUZHONG HD Wallpaper ❮ ❯ YUZHONG MOBILE LEGENDS Role: Fighter Lane: EXP Lane Tier : A Tier BP : 32000 DM : 599 Ticket : yuzhong × @ Close More Info Hero skills Yuzhong Skills 1 × Cursing Touch Yu Zhong applies (Sha Residue) to the target every time he deals damage to enemy heroes, and gathers (Sha Essence) in the meantime. (Sha Residue) erupts upon reaching 5 stacks, consuming 1 stack every 0.
